definitions.definition: Something opposite or contrary to something else.
Located directly across from something else, or from each other.
definitions.example: She saw him walking on the opposite side of the road.

definitions.definition: Of leaves and flowers, positioned directly across from each other on a stem.

definitions.example: They were moving in opposite directions.

definitions.definition: Of either of two complementary or mutually exclusive things.
definitions.example: He is attracted to the opposite sex.

definitions.definition: Extremely different; inconsistent; contrary; repugnant; antagonistic.

definitions.example: I was on my seat and she stood opposite.

definitions.definition: On another channel at the same time.
definitions.example: The game show Just Men! aired opposite The Young and the Restless on CBS.
